originalText.text: Working with Ksenya was a great experience; she was curious about my design needs and was warm, professional and respectful in every conversation. She did an in-house consultation at my New York City apartment and gave me smart suggestions about lighting, layout and furniture to improve the overall look and functionality of our space. She has excellent taste, and also understands the complexities of working within a budget. I look forward to working with her again in the future.

originalText.text: We are in the process of remodeling our apartment and had a design consultation session with Ksenya. She came over for a walk-through and she is absolutely fantastic. Ksenya has great taste, is incredibly thoughtful, detail oriented, and budget conscious. She had great suggestions on what to change for the kitchen and bathrooms, all within the style and scope of work we had in mind. I would work with her again in a heartbeat!

text.text: We are in the process of remodeling our apartment and had a design consultation session with Ksenya. She came over for a walk-through and she is absolutely fantastic. Ksenya has great taste, is incredibly thoughtful, detail oriented, and budget conscious. originalText.text: Working with Ksenya was a joy and relief. Her immediate response to my needs was spot on and helpful - like she was reading my mind. Her aesthetic for “one of a kind” thrilled me, and her ideas for our unique space translated to better use, comfort, and acceptance of “family living.” Ksenya's in-home consultation service was just what we needed to transition our setting from chaos to calm. Irvington, NY.

text.text: Working with Ksenya was a joy and relief. Her immediate response to my needs was spot on and helpful - like she was reading my mind. Her aesthetic for “one of a kind” thrilled me, and her ideas for our unique space translated to better use, comfort, and acceptance of “family living.” Ksenya's in-home consultation service was just what we needed to transition our setting from chaos to calm. Irvington, NY.

originalText.text: We had recently moved to Dobbs Ferry and were combining two apartments worth of furniture into one. Ksenya's two-hour design consultation was the perfect solution. I was worried this would be just a sales pitch without substance, but I couldn't have been more wrong. Ksenya diagnosed each room perfectly and we moved rugs, furniture, and art to create a cohesive, elevated space from pieces I already had in my home. I couldn't believe how much we got done in 2 hours. I love the results and have already recommended Time & Place Interiors to friends.

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience with the in-home design consultation service offered by Time & Place Interiors. Ksenya came to my home in Westchester and provided a lot of helpful and inspiring advice on everything from paint color to furniture lay out and rug placement and everything in between.  Ksenya was thoughtful, knowledgeable, professional, thorough and has a great eye.  I highly recommend her services and hope to work with her again in the future.
